title: WhatsApp notification keeps repeating while using Pixel Buds and Google Podcasts. Needs reboot
content: While listening to Google Podcasts through the Pixel Buds, if a new WhatsApp message is received, the noticiation chime keeps repeating endlessly. Disconnecting the Pixel Buds, closing Google Podcasts or WhatsApp does not work. The chime is still there. The only way to solve it is to reboot the Pixel5
